Commands.Beat Rush: 3-HIT melee BRV attack  Low probability of inflicting 「Small Attack Down」 for 2 turns  Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to Skeleton-types
Commands.Battle Cry: Raises BRV based on Attack then applies a ×2 multiplier  Grants 「Small Max BRV Up」 and 「The Zangan Way」 for 2 turns   「The Zangan Way」 raises Attack and lowers Action Delay
Commands.Beat Rush Recovery Attack Up: Marginally raises Attack for 3 turns  Recovers 1 use of 「Beat Rush」 (up to the initial values)  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Dolphin Blow: 2-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  Initiates a Chase Sequence  Grants 「Fever Time」 for 3 turns  Extends the duration of 「Max BRV Up」 and 「The Zangan Way」 by 3 turns   Turns 「BRV Attack」 to 「BRV Attack+」 while 「Fever Time」 is active  　∟ 3-HIT melee BRV attack   「Fever Time」 raises critical hit rate and critical BRV damage

Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence
Passives.Beat Rush Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Beat Rush ,  Beat Rush+
Passives.Power Break: Low probability of inflicting  Small Attack Down  for 3 turns after using  BRV Attack
Passives.Skeleton Killer: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt to Skeleton-type targets
Passives.Battle Cry Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Battle Cry
Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV
Passives.Break Fever: Slightly raises Max BRV for 3 turns after breaking an enemy
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Slightly raises Attack and Speed while buffed
Passives.Beat Rush Extend: Beat Rush  use +2When using  Beat Rush :- Raises BRV based on Attack before the BRV hits- Slightly raises BRV potency- Slightly raises BRV damage bonus against Skeleton-type enemies- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Triggers an HP attack after use- Lowers Action DelayWhen breaking target or attacking a broken target:-  Beat Rush  turns to  Beat Rush+    Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Attack   Slightly raises BRV potency   BRV stolen can overflow up to 180% Max BRV   Reverts to  Beat Rush  after use unless breaking target or attacking a broken target
Passives.The Zangan Way Attack: Moderately raises Attack while  The Zangan Way  is active
Passives.Battle Cry Extend: Battle Cry  use +1When using  Battle Cry :- Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Attack- Extends the duration of buffs granted by 6 turns- Lowers Action Delay- Doesn't increase turn count- Decreases Friend Support and Summon action countWhile  The Zangan Way  is active:-  HP Attack  turns to  HP Attack+    Melee BRV+HP attack
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 10%
Passives.Beat Rush Recovery Attack Up Extend: When using  Beat Rush Attack Up :- Slightly improves  Attack Up  effect

Weapons.Mythril Claw CP: 35: When using  Battle Cry :- Raises the BRV gain based on Attack- Lowers Action Delay- Improves the effects of  Max BRV Up ,  The Zangan Way  and extends their duration
Weapons.Motor Drive CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Dolphin Blow
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Beat Rush Recovery Attack Up  use +2
Weapons.Tiger Fang CP: 15: When using  Beat Rush ,  Beat Rush+ :- Raises BRV potency- Raises the success rate of  Attack Down  and extends its duration
